txt.en: 'You want to continue in gaining renown among the Lossoth, do you? Then I can help. I can provide enough Reputation to help you become a friend of the Lossoth.'
'Alright, soon you will be a Friend of the Lossoth of Forochel. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered a Friend of the Lossoth of Forochel.
